151744.en:
Please rest assured that the town has already been informed of your presence. The basement of the town is
a multi-level structure. If you step off the bridge, you will fall to the lowest level. Ah. But you were
summoned by Mr. Claws, weren't you? Knight's Quarters is at the lowest level.

This is . I am very sorry for my earlier apology, even though I did not know it. My name is Breyga. I
am the battle captain of the Order of the Gale. I am the battle commander of the Order of the Gale. Master Claws is
waiting for you at Knight's Quarters. The room is to your right, as you see me. Please go there.

151753.en:
Oh <pc>. If I may ask, did
you get your hands on some Divine Wind
Reins?<yesno><break>

151755.en:
The Divine Beast Amazlantelope used to often appear to save those injured by wind and lightning. She is now healing
in Stormbough, in the Heavenly Field east of the Town of Must. I hope he is safe. . If you have
received Divine Wind Reins, please go to Stormbough immediately.

151769.en:
Oh <pc>. Did you get to meet
Divine Beast Amazlantelope?<yesno><break>

151774.en:
Good job! Ms. Fuura's rescue. Well done! Ms. Anlucia has gone to the meeting room with Ms.
Fuura to report. By the way, Mr. Claws said he had some business to attend to, so please come to the meeting room
as well.

151777.en:
Oh ! You are indeed good at recovering the Vessel of God from the clutches of the Nadraga cult!
Master Claws is waiting for you in the meeting room. The Vessels of God have gathered.

151785.en:
Good work . I see you are off on another mission. Oh my, you are going to the southeast of Heavenly
Field to defeat Dark Buzzard, aren't you? Please be careful and have a good trip!

151786.en:
Oh . Are you going somewhere? Oh, to defeat Dark Buzzard? He is a monster in the southeast area
of Heavenly Field, isn't he? I wish you good luck.

151788.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>I heard there was an intruder! So it's
not safe here anymore either. Oh my
god.

151789.en:
! We believe the intruder is still lurking in this basement! Please head for the spiritual nucleus
of creation to protect it! The meeting room is located at the lowest level. Anlucia should be there!

151791.en:
I saw some suspicious looking men wandering around the area. I immediately recognized them as members
of the Nadraga cult. I wanted to follow them, but Hyuza, who happened to be nearby, insisted that he would
take care of it. I've reported them to Master Claws and am trying to find them, but I can't seem to find them.

151792.en:
The intruder seems to be hiding somewhere. They may be waiting for an opportunity to take the spiritual core
of creation. We will take care of the search for the intruder. please join Mr. Claws in guarding the
spiritual nucleus of creation. Beyond the door in front of me, behind the meeting room, is the Room of Defense
where the Spiritual Nucleus of Creation is housed. I wish you good luck!

151793.en:
Those Knights of the Gale are running around like a bunch of busybodies, but something must have happened to them,
right? Please don't do this. If I can't stay here any longer, I won't have anywhere to go!

151794.en:
The intruders will have to be dealt with by the Knights of the Fast and Furious. If the Knights fail, that's
the end of it. We won't be of any help.

151795.en:
I've closed the door on the ladder there to narrow down the intruder's escape route. We can't let them out of
here!

151796.en:
A while ago, I saw a couple of suspicious-looking people. They went down to the lowest level. There's a
genesis nucleus at the lowest level, right? Damn. I should have stopped them then. Where the hell were they
hiding?

151797.en:
I heard there was an intruder in the house. Don't tell me there's going to be a fight here? Should we get out of
here right away? But where? There's nowhere for us to run!

151798.en:
Living with the Knights of the Fast Wind, who are opposed to the Order of Nadraga, I had expected this to
happen. At the moment, the intruders don't seem to have any intention to go on a rampage openly. Let's wait and
see how things go. But if push comes to shove, I'm prepared to lay down my life. As mayor, I must protect
everyone.

151801.en:
I'm sorry, but we've had to close the door to the entrance and exit ahead of us. The intruder is still lurking
somewhere. We can't let them get away!

151802.en:
I haven't heard the details, but I heard that the Knights of the Fast and Furious keep something important in
the back room of the lowest level. If so, did someone or something come in here for that? If so, it's a very bad
Kunai!

151803.en:
I heard something about an intruder, but I don't think a monster got in. If monsters start coming in here, there
won't be any place where we can live in peace anymore!

151805.en:
Oh . Mr. Fuura went out with Prince Raguas. I tried to stop him, but he went away without saying
anything. I can't leave my post, so could you please go check the church side entrance and exit?

I'm sorry. I have unintentionally missed the intruder with Princess Anlucia. I chased after
them when they came out of the assembly hall, but I didn't expect them to suddenly disappear by some
mysterious means. I'll search this area without a trace. I want to search the upper
levels. Please do so!

<pc> went up the ladder. But
the door at the end of the ladder was
wedged shut and he could not get out.

151809.en:
<pc> went up the ladder. But
the door at the end of the ladder was
wedged shut and he could not get out.

151811.en:
I heard that the intruder got away,
but please don't do this anymore. I
don't have time to relax.

151812.en:
I heard from Mr. Claws. You are going to Storm Tower to prevent the Fire Realm from connecting with this
property. If you are looking for the Storm Tower, it is just west of the Town of Must and northwest of Thunder
Hill. I wish you good luck.

151813.en:
The cultists have the unlocking disk in the Storm Tower and are trying to connect the Storm Realm to the Fire
Realm. If they do so, all the realms will be connected. We must avoid that. I want you to prevent this with your
own hands. Hurry to the Storm Tower, northwest of Thunder Hill, west of the city!

151815.en:
I heard the story from Mr. Claws. I had no idea that the fish-like man and the girl with wings were being
controlled by Evil Will. From the very beginning, they were after the vessel of God, not the spiritual core of
creation. Damn it, I've been outsmarted.

160411.en:
Ah ! We, the Knights of the Swift Wind, have scattered to various places to gather information
on Evil Will. By the way, since Mr. Claws seemed to be waiting for you, could you please come to the meeting
room at the lowest level?

160412.en:
Good night . It seems that Master Claws wants to see you in the meeting room. I am awaiting the
return of the scout who is keeping an eye on the movements of the Nadraga cult. There is still no sign of his
return.

160413.en:
I heard about this. I understand that you and Mr. Claws are going to visit Nadraga shrines in
various places. In this territory, you can find a shrine in the northeastern part of the town, past Cape Squall,
through Heavenly Field. We, the Knights of the Swift Wind, have suffered a considerable amount of pain
during our reconnaissance. Please be careful.

160414.en:
After I left the meeting room a few minutes ago, I thought I saw a strong light emanating from inside the door?
Well, that's not important, isn't heading for the Nadraga Shrine in each realm together with
Master Claws? Shall I explain the location of the strongholds in each realm based on the information from
the scouts? Fire Realm Horseshoe Ice Realm Dust Dust of the Dark Realm Hobbles of the Water Realm Dust of Storm Realm Don't ask for explanation

160416.en:
I had heard that Prince Raguas had gone home, but just now I witnessed a tired Fluffy being carried out of the
house. Could that be?

160417.en:
and Lord Claws are willing to risk their lives to go to the Nadraga Shrine. Let us also
protect the spiritual core of creation with our lives.

160418.en:
Welcome back !It seems that all of the Vessels of God are being treated at Knight's Quarters at
the lowest level.

160419.en:
Welcome back. We have heard from the Claws about your activities at the Nadraga Shrine. All
of the Ocompanion are receiving treatment at Knight's Quarters. It seems that Master Claws is on his way
there as well.

160421.en:
A few minutes ago, a beautiful woman in priest's clothes walked by with a hurried look on her face, but she
seemed to have made up her mind. I can't help but feel worried about her.

160422.en:
Estella has left us. She must have gone back to Holy City Ejarna, right? I'm kind of worried. When I went to
Holy City Ejarna to call and the others, the whole town was very unsettled.

160423.en:
What a surprise! NadragaGreat Temple's warding has disappeared? I don't know what the Nadraga cult is thinking. I
heard that Estella went to Ejarna by herself, but I am worried about her.

160425.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>What in the world is going on at the
Great Temple in Ejarna?

160426.en:
The beautiful woman in priest's
clothing who left here is not with us,
is she?

160427.en:
Ah ! I am so glad to hear that you are well. I see that Estella is not with you. I am worried about
her too. If you are Claws, you will find waiting for you at the church just outside the exit to
the ground level.

160428.en:
When you were brought in at Kanoke, I felt despair like the end of the world. I am so glad you are alive. It
looked like you could have gone out from the top floor exit to the church ruins. I guess you are waiting for
?

160429.en:
You're alive! Thank goodness, thank goodness! I was so surprised when you were brought in at karaoke that I
didn't have time to have a drink!

160430.en:
Princess Anlucia's heartbreaking cry when she saw you lying there was the saddest thing I've ever heard in my
life.

160431.en:
There was a lot of commotion at lowest level, but I wonder if something happened to the spiritual nucleus of
creation?

160432.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv3><end_attr><shake_big>Hyaaaaaaaah! Are you a ghost, by any
chance?<bw_break>

160433.en:
What the hell! I can't believe you're alive! You scared the shit out of me, you know that? You screamed like a
little girl.

160436.en:
I hear a groan of agony coming from inside the door. It seems that the vessels of God are resting inside.
Let's leave them alone for now.

163946.en:
I heard that you are a relative of . I'm surprised you came all the way here. This place used to
be a mine a long time ago. The tracks like this are the remnants of when the Minecart used to run here. After the
mine closed, it was left alone for a long time. Now it is used as a shelter.
163946.ja:

163947.en:
The Order of the Gale was formed by and Master Claws, who both objected to the tenets of the
Order of Nadraga. In the beginning, there were few people in town who would listen to the words of the two
of them, and it was difficult to recruit members for the Order. But they never gave up and continued to
talk to the townspeople, and as a result, the number of members gradually increased. But we still need
more people. We are planning to recruit members from all over the world in order to expand our power!
163947.ja:

163948.en:
Are you the Claws' acquaintance that people are talking about? Take your time. When we evacuated here, we
brought a lot of stuff with us from the town above. So we have all the facilities you need.
163948.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚“ãŸãŒã€€ã‚¦ãƒ¯ã‚µã«ãªã£ã¦ã‚‹ ã€€ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¦ã‚ºã•ã‚“ã®ã€€çŸ¥ã‚Šåˆã„ã‹ã„ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã“ã‚“ãªã¨ã“ã ã‘ã©ã€€ã‚†ã£ãã‚Šã—ã¦ã„ããªã€‚

163949.en:
This used to be the sleeping quarters of the townspeople, but now we are using it as a meeting room for the
Order of the Knights of the Spree. The back room of the meeting room contains important items, so please do not go
near there.

163950.en:
You look like a stranger. It's always stormy out here, with wind storms and heavy thunderstorms. I don't know how
many people from this town have lost their lives. You must be careful, too.

163951.en:
The ladder there also leads to a house in the upper town, but it's a dead end. It's locked just in case, but
you're welcome to take it off. I'll keep an eye on things here.

163952.en:
Hmmm. You must be 's relative. Now that you put it that way, I'm starting to see the
resemblance. By the way, the fish-like guy who was with me. I saw that he was quite a skilled fighter. I'd like to
have a meeting with him once. You're fine, though. Hmm.

163953.en:
I can't wait to go back to the town. Living in such a dark and cramped place, I feel like my heart will be
destroyed. But now that he's here. His soft touch and his dull eyes soothe my heart.

163954.en:
Oh, you are . I have heard about you from Master Claws. I am Irugi, the Mayor of Must. You must
be frightened to find your town deserted. I sent everyone here to evacuate before the monster's damage
became too great. Monsters were not the only reason. There's something strange about the smell of the wind
these days, too. By the way, I thought up the riddle about the candle that opens the hidden staircase in the
church. You didn't see it, did you? If so, it may have been a little too easy.
163954.ja:
ã€ŒãŠãŠã€€ãŠã¬ã—ãŒã€€ã˜ã‚ƒãªã€‚ ã€€ãŠã¬ã—ã®ã“ã¨ã¯ã€€ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¦ã‚ºæ§˜ã‹ã‚‰ã€€èã„ã¦ãŠã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã—ã¯ã€€ãƒ ã‚¹ãƒˆç”ºé•·ã€€ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚®ã˜ã‚ƒã€‚

163955.en:
We had to evacuate everyone here before the damage to Monster got worse. It's the mayor's
responsibility. Monsters aren't the only reason. There's something wrong with the smell of the wind these days,
too. By the way, the riddle about the candle that opens the church's hidden staircase was my idea. You didn't see
it, did you? If so, it may have been a little too easy.
163955.ja:

163956.en:
After the Order of the Gale was established, I started seeing a lot of people with weapons, and I was a
little scared. But that was a misunderstanding. Everyone is very kind to us because they care about us.
Especially Mr. Breyga, who seems to like children more than he looks and plays with our children a lot.

163957.en:
The teleportal there has been there for a long time. I heard that you can go outside with Zoomstone, but if you
want to pray to the goddess of the church above, you can use that to get there quickly!

163959.en:
The ladder at the end of the hall leads to the Heavenly Field. You will have to remove the key from the door
by yourself.

163960.en:
You were , weren't you? Mr. Claws is waiting for you at Knight's Quarters, so please go there
first.

163961.en:
The buildings in the upper town were built to withstand the storm, but there's nothing we can do if the wind
itself contains poison. Besides, it's almost impossible to prevent the invasion of those horrible monsters.
Will there ever be a day when we can return to the upper town? I don't want to hide underground and live in
seclusion for the rest of my life.
163961.ja:
ã€Œä¸Šã®ç”ºã®å»ºç‰©ã¯ã€€å¤§åµã«ã‚‚è€ãˆã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã† ã€€ãŒã‚“ã˜ã‚‡ã†ã«ä½œã£ã¦ã‚ã£ãŸãŒã€€é¢¨ãã®ã‚‚ã®ã« ã€€æ¯’ãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒã€€ã©ã†ã—ã‚ˆã†ã‚‚ãªã„ã€‚

163962.en:
The Knights of the Gale was formed to fight against the Nadraga cult, but they also keep the town safe. When the
upper town was attacked by many monsters, the Knights of the Gale saved us. Thanks to them, we were able
to evacuate. But the terrible karmic wind that blew before that was too much for the Knights to handle. I'm
really thankful for that girl's help.
163962.ja:
ã€Œç–¾é¢¨ã®é¨å£«å›£ã¯ã€€ãƒŠãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¬æ•™å›£ã« ã€€å¯¾æŠ—ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€€çµæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸçµ„ç¹”ã ãŒ ã€€ç”ºã®å®‰å…¨ã‚‚ã€€å®ˆã£ã¦ãã‚Œã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã€‚

163963.en:
climbed the ladder.
Atop of the ladder is a locked door. removed the lock from the door.

163965.en:
climbed the ladder.
Atop of the ladder is a locked door. removed the lock from the door.

163968.en:
The door is covered by a strong ward.
It seems that it is impossible to
enter.

163969.en:
A map of Holy City Ejarna is pasted on the wall. The papers around the map seem to contain information about the
mission of the Knights of the Gale.

163970.en:
The time has come for me to fulfill Mr. Claws' request to recreate Astoltia's Travel Concierge here. It
is also the time for my efforts to come to fruition. So, let's get started!

163971.en:
Why is there a statue of a woman in the upper church and not Nadraga? It has always been a mystery to me.
However, Mr. Claws told me. I think that the statue is a replica of Goddess Lutiana, who is said to have
created Nadragand. Oops. I was making unnecessary small talk. Let me fulfill my duty.

163972.en:
Claws asked me to introduce his ''support companion'' here as well. I did my best. I'm glad I could do it.
Well, let's see...
163972.ja:
ã€Œã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆä»²é–“ã£ã¦ãƒ¤ãƒ„ã‚’ ã€€ã“ã“ã§ã‚‚ã€€ç´¹ä»‹ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¦ã»ã—ã„ã¨ ã€€ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¦ã‚ºã•ã‚“ã«ã€€é ­ã‚’ä¸‹ã’ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ãªã€‚

163973.en:
Mr. Claws asked me to learn the art of career change, and it seems it was for your benefit. I don't know if I can
pull it off, but I'll try. I'll see you around.
163973.ja:
ã€Œã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¦ã‚ºã•ã‚“ã«é ¼ã¾ã‚Œã¦ ã€€è»¢è·ã¨ã„ã†æŠ€ã‚’ã€€å­¦ã‚“ã§ãã¾ã—ãŸãŒ ã€€ã©ã†ã‚„ã‚‰ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã®ãŸã‚ã ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã­ã€‚

163975.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Oh, really? Because it often appears
in my sister's stories from other
countries!

163976.en:
Huh? Then you must be the wrong
person. I'm sorry.

163977.en:
If you are, are you looking for church? If so, it's just down the street. I'm sorry it's not easy to
find. It seems that the priest insisted on a well-lit place.

163978.en:
Oh . I think Mr. Claws asked you to come to the meeting room, didn't he? The meeting room is at the
lowest level. It's somewhat dangerous, but it's quicker to fall down from the bridge.

163979.en:
Claws and Anlucia have entered the meeting room. should also head there immediately. The
meeting room is through the door in front of me.

163980.en:
I can't wait to go back to the town. Living in such a dark and cramped place, I feel like my heart will be
destroyed. But now that Prince Raguas has come. His soft hand and delicate eyes soothe my heart.

163981.en:
<color_yellow>''Gale Costume'' has been
added to the list of Hero Princess
Anlucia's costume!<me 71> <color_white>From now on, Anlucia
will appear in a new, overdressed
costume!

163983.en:
Anlucia-chan is a princess of some country! And she's also a yusha. I don't really know what a yusha is, but
big sister Anlucia is amazing!
163983.ja:
ã€Œã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒ«ã‚·ã‚¢ãŠå§‰ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã£ã¦ ã€€ã©ã“ã‹ã®å›½ã®ã€€ãŠå§«ã•ã¾ã€€ãªã‚“ã ã£ã¦ï¼

163984.en:
The girl with the different races taken by the Nadraga cultist was named Fuura, wasn't she? She was a very
dainty girl. . Please get Divine Wind Reins to save her. I don't know much about it, but I heard that
you can go to a place called Inamino Highway in Eltona Continent!
163984.ja:
ã€ŒãƒŠãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¬æ•™å›£ã®è€…ãŒé€£ã‚Œã¦ã„ãŸã€€ç•°ç¨®æ—ã®å°‘å¥³ã¯ ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¦ãƒ©ã•ã‚“ã¨ã„ã†åå‰ãªã®ã§ã™ã­ã€‚

163985.en:
I, too, have received a report from Basse on the movement of the Nadraga cult. It has become a problem. The
Nadraga Shrine, where a girl named Fuura, one of the vessels of God, was supposedly taken, is just beyond Cape
Squall. The winds there are so strong and incessant that we cannot cross on foot. What are we to do? Oh, you are
heading for the Inamino Highway in the continent of Eltona to look for clues. I wish you good luck .

163987.en:
Oh! Then why don't you go see Divine Beast Amazlantelope right now and ask for her help? Divine Beast
Amazlantelope is located in Stormbough, just northwest of the Town of Must in Heavenly Field!

163988.en:
I see. So you are worried about Anlucia? If you are Anlucia, she is in the meeting room. Why don't you go see
her?

163989.en:
What a surprise! Divine Beast Amazlantelope has offered to lend his help? That's what is all
about. Then we should be able to cross Cape Squall. You can reach the Nadraga Shrine. Cape Squall is northeast of
this must. Please go to Nadraga Shrine and save Fuura-san!

163990.en:
Okay. . Please meet Divine Beast Amazlantelope. And ask for the Divine Beast's power.
Otherwise, you will not be able to go to the Nadraga Shrine where Mr. Fuura was taken.

164005.en:
MU? I thought was protected by the spiritual nucleus of creation. Surely, something has
happened? I see...you are ordered by Claws-sama to protect the Vessels of God in the assembly hall together with
Anlucia-sama. The assembly hall is to my left. Leave the search for the intruder to us, and please hurry!

164006.en:
What? Hyuza is Princess Anlucia? Wasn't Lord Hyuza a friend of ? How did that happen?
Anyway, please go back to the assembly hall and stop Lord Hyuza at all costs!

<pc> went up the ladder. But
the door at the end of the ladder was
wedged shut and he could not get out.

164011.en:
I'm sorry, sir! Due to an emergency, I have been given strict orders by Master Claws that no one is to pass
through here. If you use the teleportal near the priest, you will be able to go out to the upper town,
so please enter from there!

164012.en:
Due to an emergency, we have received orders from Mr. Claws that no one is to pass through here. Please return.
If you wish to leave, please use the exit on the upper level that leads to the church of the female idol.

164013.en:
I just saw Prince Raguas and Mr. Fuura going to the upper level alone. I haven't received any report that they
caught the intruder, so I guess they are safe now. Is it Mr. Hyuza? I did not see him, but he may have followed
you two to the upper levels.

164014.en:
The Knights of the Order are currently searching with all their might for the intruder who has been terrorizing
Princess Anlucia. I will search this area without a trace. I would like to search the upper
levels. Please do so!

164015.en:
I think Mr. Fuura and Prince Raguas were heading upstairs, but I don't know if I should have stopped them. I
don't know if I should have stopped them. They seemed to be acting kind of strange, so I was a little scared.

164016.en:
Raguas and Fuura, right? Two little guys were walking toward the entrance to the church. I wondered what they
were doing when I heard the intruder was coming, but I couldn't let go of their hands.

164017.en:
So Hyuza was already being manipulated
when he chased after the intruder. I
didn't notice that at all.

164018.en:
The Knights of the Fast and Furious
took care of the intruder, didn't
they? I'm relieved to hear that.

164019.en:
The intruder is gone and the door on the ladder is open. But it means that the Order has found out that the base
of the Knights of the Fast Wind is here. We have to keep a closer watch than ever before.

164020.en:
Living together with the Knights of the Spree who oppose the Order of Nadraga, I had expected such a
situation. But if intruders can enter so easily. We must further develop countermeasures.

164021.en:
I thought the intruders would flee this way, but I was outwitted. Yeah, I've got the entrances and exits
unlocked. You're free to use it.

164022.en:
Apparently, the intruder wasn't a monster. I'm a little relieved. If monsters start invading here, there
will be no place where I can live in peace anymore!

164024.en:
The trespassers have left the area and
the no trespassing order has been
lifted. Please pass through.

164025.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>Princess Anlucia and her friends
haven't seen their guests for a while.

164026.en:
We can now confirm that the Storm Realm and Fire Realm are connected. What's going on? The Nadraga cult
itself was being used by Evil Will? No way. I see that is going to the Great Temple in Holy City
Ejarna to find out. Please be careful.

164027.en:
I had no idea that the Nadraga cult was being used by Evil Will. is going to the Great
Temple in Holy City Ejarna to find out. Please be careful.

164028.en:
Lord Claws said that when all the realms are connected, a Nadragram Shrine will appear. If Nadraga is
resurrected there, what will happen to us dragon people?
164028.ja:
ã€Œã™ã¹ã¦ã®é ˜ç•ŒãŒã€€ã¤ãªãŒã£ãŸã¨ã ã€€ç¥å¢ŸãƒŠãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã¨ã„ã†ã‚‚ã®ãŒã€€ç¾ã‚Œã‚‹ã¨ ã€€ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¦ã‚ºæ§˜ãŒã€€è¨€ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

164029.en:
All the realms are connected. Even the power of could not stop it. Master Claws is currently in the
meeting room to discuss future plans. Evil Will's next target may be the nucleus of creation this time. We need
to tighten our security even more.

164030.en:
The number of monsters in the upper town doesn't seem to be decreasing. We will be forced to live underground for
the time being.

164031.en:
The Knights of the Gale sometimes go out and get food and stuff for us. Without them, we would have been
wasted a long time ago. No one can complain about that.

164032.en:
We have to watch over it more closely than ever. There is still the spiritual core of creation here. We
must protect it.

164033.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Evil Will is trying to destroy the
world? He's a crazy guy, isn't he?

164034.en:
Prince Raguas went back to his home, the Knights of the Fast and Furious said. I'll never be able to feel that
fluff in my hands again.

164035.en:
We are not told what the Knights of the Gale are hiding behind the meeting room. But the townspeople sense that
it is of great importance to Nadragand, so we do not blame them for bringing it in. So we do not blame
them for bringing it here.
164035.ja:

164036.en:
It seems that the members of the Order of the Gale are all somewhat listless. Would it please them if I made them
something delicious and brought it to them?

164037.en:
I'm going to ask Uncle Breyga to teach me how to use a sword or something. Then I can protect my mother and
sister Yorau by myself no matter what happens!

164038.en:
I've decided to stay awake to prevent someone from breaking in again. If I sleep, please give me Sobering Slap of
Prosperity.

164039.en:
There are rumors that the Storm Realm and the Fire Realm are connected. I'd like to see what's going on in the
other realms, but I'm not sure I'm willing to plunge into the blustery winds and thunderstorms.
164039.ja:
ã€Œãªã‚“ã‹ã€€ã“ã®åµã®é ˜ç•Œã¨ã€€ç‚ã®é ˜ç•ŒãŒ ã€€ã¤ãªãŒã£ãŸãªã‚“ã¦ã€€ã‚¦ãƒ¯ã‚µãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‚“ã ãŒ ã€€æœ¬å½“ã‹ã­ï¼Ÿ

164040.en:
I wonder how long we have to live here. I'm worried about the house that's been left unattended. I'm sure
the monster has ransacked the place.

164041.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I want to play outside with my brother
Kogii. But he says it's too dangerous.

164042.en:
Even if the evil god returns, the
Knights of the Swift Wind will surely
protect everyone in this town!

164043.en:
When Mr. Claws told me to go to Holy City Ejarna to prepare for the mission, I was a little nervous. I had
never been there before. It was such a lively place. I shouldn't have done that. Please come to the meeting room
at the lowest level ASAP.

164044.en:
. I understand that you went to the Great Temple, but did you learn anything? Did you learn anything
from your visit to the Great Temple? Well, it seems that the Nadraga cult is completely under the control of
Evil Will. I'm sorry, but could you please report the details to Mr. Claws? He is in the meeting room.
164044.ja:

164045.en:
The rest of the story will be released in the next big update version 3.5! Please wait for a
while for the release.

164046.en:
A teleportal to Storm Realm and Fire
Realm appeared in Hall of Invitation!

164047.en:
A teleportal to the Storm Realm and Fire Realm has appeared in the Hall of Invitation! Once again, you can
continue the story by entering the meeting room and meeting with the Claws. But first, would you like to
take a look back at your memories of Lore of the Ancient Dragon?

164050.en:
I have added the ''Lore of the Ancient
Dragon Recollection 6'' to the list of
Memory Projector.

164051.en:
I can't stop thinking about the woman who passed by there a while ago. She was dressed like a priest, but I
wonder who she was.

164052.en:
We, the Knights of the Swift Wind, will protect the spiritual core of creation even at the cost of our
lives, so don't worry!

164053.en:
. Now is the time to endure. The Order of Nadraga, no, not until Evil Will makes his next move.
Haste makes waste. That's what I mean.

164054.en:
Estella, the Priestess, had very sad
eyes. But I felt a very strong light
in the depths of her eyes.

164055.en:
I don't know if we can be of any help to the cultists, but to someone as mysterious as Evil Will, I don't know
if we can. We probably won't be able to do anything without your help. I'll ask for your help then!
164055.ja:

164056.en:
If you are Claws, you are in the back room guarding the nucleus of creation. He said that no one is allowed in
there for a while. If there is any problem, we will contact immediately.

164393.en:
<pc> went up the ladder. But
the door at the end of the ladder was
wedged shut and he could not get out.

164963.en:
The door has a strong ward. Thanks to
Nico, the wards seem to be getting
stronger.

165574.en:
What happened to the intruder? I
didn't see anything that looked like
it, so I guess they're long gone.

165575.en:
Prince Raguas and Mr. Fuura went up
through here. But Prince Raguas looked
tired, so I couldn't talk to him.

165576.en:
I'm sorry, but we've had to close the doorway up ahead. So far we haven't seen any intruders, but I'm sure
they're out there somewhere.

165577.en:
Intruder. My little niece lives in the
room down the hall. Please don't come
this way!

165578.en:
Prince Raguas hasn't come back yet. I hope it's not true that he won't come back. I want that dull Hitomi to make
me sick right now.

165579.en:
I heard the intruder left. I never saw
him after all, but I wonder what kind
of guy he was.

166987.en:
I'm sorry, sir! Due to an emergency, I have been given strict orders by Master Claws that no one is to pass
through here. If you use the teleportal near the priest, you will be able to go out to the upper town,
so please enter from there!

166988.en:
I don't know what happened, but if it's an emergency, we have no choice. Let's take the teleportal back to the
upper town and re-enter the church through the female idol.

166989.en:
I could hear Nico's voice in
<pc>'s mind.

169263.en:
If you are looking for Fire Realm, the fort is located north of Red Hot Desert. It is best to go there from
Apeka Village.

169264.en:
If you are in the Ice Realm, the fort is located northeast of the Frosty Ice Field. It is best to go there from the
Ice Tower.

169265.en:
If you are in the Dark Realm, the fort is located east of Dark Vale. It is best to go there from Carlamora
Village.

169266.en:
If you are looking for the Water Realm, the site is located in the Sea of Sleep, south of Orfine Undersea. It
is located in Sea of Sleep, south of Orfine Undersea.

169267.en:
If you are looking for the Storm Realm, the fort is located northeast of the Town of Must, through Heavenly
Field and past Cape Squall.

169268.en:
I am sure <pc> can help your
companion!<bw_break>

169269.en:
Please be careful. Please take care of
Mr. Claws. Leave the protection of the
spiritual core to us, the Knights!

170882.en:
Thank you for letting take care of those strange flowers. The companion of the Knights did not
find out about it. I enjoyed watering it every day until it sprouted and flowered.

170883.en:
One day, when I can live peacefully in the town above, I might even grow some flowers. If it's an ordinary flower,
that is! Ha-ha-ha.

170884.en:
Ah .You have come to the right place. Actually, there is something I would like to discuss with
you. The other day, I found some plant seeds in front of the door of the Room of Defense in the back. I wondered why
there were seeds in such a mine shaft.I was curious, so I planted them in a pot and tried to grow them. Then,
a very strange flower bloomed.I was worried that it might be a new species of monster. I thought about getting
rid of it, but I am hesitant to do so because I took good care of it.

So I would like to ask , who is reputed to have a broad knowledge of the subject, to make a
judgment. First, could you take a look at the flowers?

170886.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Ugh, could you please take a look at
it?Such a strange flower. I can't
handle it. I don't know what to do.

170887.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Oh, thank you.It's been hidden from
public view. I'll bring it to you in a
moment.

170888.en:
Oh, it's a monster.It's a monster, no
matter how you look at it. Why did I
grow seeds?

170889.en:
Oh. If you are willing to take it back?I would be relieved if could take care of it.
Please don't tell anyone about this flower.

170890.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>It seems that <pc> has a lot
of requests. He is a dependable
person, so it is only natural.

170891.en:
I will hide the flowers until I finish my other business.However, if you could come early, it would be very
helpful.

them back?

170893.en:
Anyway, I'm going to hide the flowers
to keep them out of sight. But I don't
know what to do.

170894.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Oh <pc>. Perhaps you would

strange flowers?<yesno><break>

170895.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Ugh, I see you're wrong. You're the
only one I can rely on. I don't know
what to do.

170896.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Oh, thank you.It's been hidden from
public view. I'll bring it to you in a
moment.

170897.en:
Oh, it's still undulating.It's a
monster, no matter how you look at it.
Why did I grow seeds?

170898.en:
! Long time no see! I'm sorry to be called a monster, but thanks to that spearman, Nico is back
with a vengeance! I know you were able to reinforce the warding.I know you were able to strengthen the warding.
As a token of my gratitude, do me a favor!

170899.en:
I say thank you. It's a token of my appreciation for strengthening my warding, which is just what I should
have done. Well then, I'm going to go into your bosom. Oh, my goodness, this is very nostalgic.

170900.en:
You have no taste that you can't see how cute I am, designed by . You spear man. But he
took rather good care of it until it sprouted and flowered. I say thank you.

170901.en:
I know you can't hear me.I think and are the only two people who can hear me.
By the way, is this the room where the spearmen talk about rumors? I've heard all kinds of stories. The interesting
ones were about plants from other realms.But were they true? I've always wanted to see for myself. I'd like to
see the flaming tree plant first.There is no such thing as a burning tree. Take me to it right away!

<pipipi_shigh>If you forget where you're going, you
can always ask me. If you haven't
forgotten, you can still talk to me.

170903.en:
I'd like to say thank you, but you seem to have a lot on your plate. My wish is not easy. You'll have to come
back when you've taken care of something else. Hurry up.

170904.en:
You are going to deny me my special, liliant wish created by your ? I'm shocked. Come back if you change
your mind. Maybe soon. I know you are a kind person.

173121.en:
You have come to the right place, . I think you might be able to do me a favor. Do you know
that there are many tombs on the northern edge of the town above? These are the tombs where the people of the
town sleep. They have been neglected since they were evacuated here. I want to give it a good cleaning for the
first time in a while. But there's still a mistery monster wandering around upstairs, and the Knights of
the Fast and Furious are looking busy, so it's hard for me to ask them for help. I know you are busy, but there
is no one else I can ask. Can you take care of the tomb for me?

173122.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Oh, you can do it! The townspeople who
are sleeping in tombs will be a little
better off now.

173123.en:
But first. I'd like you to meet a woman named Juei who lives in a mid- rise house first. She said she has a
favor to ask if you take care of Tomb. I would appreciate it .

173124.en:
Oh, you can do it! The townspeople who are sleeping in tombs will be a little better off now. Hmm. But you seem to
have a lot of favors to ask of me. I cannot ask you to do that. When you are free, will you come again?

173125.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I'm still busy. You are busy, after
all. Whenever you have time, that's
fine, so please come again.

173126.en:
It's good that you left it to the mayor, but the knights seem to be on important work, and it's hard to ask
them to do something like that, isn't it?

173127.en:
I'm going to ask Uncle Breyga to teach me how to use a sword or something. Then I can protect my mother and
sister Yorau by myself no matter what happens!

173128.en:
I have to do my best to make up for my
father who passed away!

173129.en:
I wanted to play outside with my brother Kogii, but he said it was too dangerous. I used to have a lot of fun
playing with my friend Harumbe. Harumbe is gone now.

173130.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Harumbe. Harumbe drew a picture of me
once. I have kept it forever.

173131.en:
I want you to take care of the tomb on the north edge of the upper town, which has been neglected for a long
time.

173132.en:
But first, could you meet a woman named Juei who lives in a mid-rise house? She said she has a favor to ask
if you take care of Tomb. I'd appreciate it .

173134.en:
<icon_exc>Perhaps the mayor has asked you to
take care of the tombola?<yesno><break>

173135.en: Yes. I'm sorry. I guess I was wrong.

173136.en:
I guess you're right! I'm glad you found someone who can do it. I believe your name is . I've heard
a lot about you from Claws. I'm sure you'll be able to take down the monster in the upper town when he
finds you!

173137.en:
To tell you the truth. I was the one who started the idea of taking care of the tombola. And you know what? I
would like to ask you for a favor before you go to take care of the tombs. I want to make an offering for
one of the tombs. I need to make an offering for one of the tombs, but I can't find the materials to make it
here. I need two things. First, Tree Soul Fluff, which <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Stormbough, Heavenly Field drops. I
also need <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>. The townspeople used to get it for me, but the winds have made it difficult. It's
often used as an ingredient in the Saiho, so if you go to a store that sells that kind of stuff, you should
be able to get it there. I need you to get both this Tree Soul Fluff and <%sev_que_name4> and bring them to me.
Please! .

<pc>. I'm sorry, but would

you to do the same.

173140.en:
Before you go to take care of the tomb, I need your help to make an offering. There are two things we
need. First, Tree Soul Fluff, which <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Stormbough at Heavenly Field drops. I also need
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>. The townspeople used to get it for me, but the winds have made it difficult. It's often used as
an ingredient in the Saiho, so if you go to a store that sells that kind of stuff, you should be able to get it
there. I need you to get both this Tree Soul Fluff and <%sev_que_name4> and bring them to me. Please!
.

When you're done with that one, you

above.

Ah . I was wondering if you had gotten the materials to make the offerings? I need one Tree Soul
Fluff and one <%sev_que_name4>, but it looks like <%sev_que_name4> is still missing. <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> is used as
an ingredient in the Saiho, so I'm sure I can buy it somewhere. Go get it somehow!

Then take care of the other tombolas together. Just the ones that aren't broken. There are five tombs in the

I'm thinking of asking Uncle Breyga to teach me how to use a sword. I was so envious when I saw Harumbe here with
his toy sword.

competition to see who would be better

That was a toy sword your mother was

I had one made for me before. When I gave it to Harumbe, she was really pleased. Harumbe said, ''I'm going to

I've been waiting for you . I see that you have offered the Soft Sword to the tomb. I
see you also took care of the other tombs. Thank you so much. Thank you so much. I hope this will help us both
feel a little better. Hey . You know Breyga of the Order of the Gale, don't you?

173168.en:
The tombola that was offered to me is.... It is the tomb of his wife, Endera, and his son, Harumbe. Both of
them were attacked by a monster in the town and died. We were attacked by a monster too. My husband defended me
and the children and became the monster's prey. Just when we thought we were going to die, Breyga saved us.
But because of that, Breyga was unable to help the people who were most important to her. I wanted to do
something for them, but the only thing I could think of was to make an offering to their tomb.

173170.en:
This is <pc>. Can I help you
with something, sir?

173171.en:
No, I'm sorry, do you have any
particular need for me? If so, that's
fine.

173172.en:
How dare make offerings to the tombs of Endella and Harumbe! I see, Juei asked the mayor to take care
of the tomb. Thank you very much. It is not Mr. Juei's fault that they died. It was all my fault.

173173.en:
I was informed of the monster's attack on that day by Mr. Claws' prediction. However, I didn't believe in that
prediction, or rather, I didn't believe in Mr. Claws himself at all. As a result, I let both of them die.
Luckily, I was able to save Juei and her children. After that, I managed to escape the monster and built a tomb
for the two of them, but I still couldn't forgive myself. I was determined to take as many monsters as
possible with me when they appeared in the town above, and I plunged into the monster hordes with the intention of
dying.

173174.en:
But I couldn't die. I was cornered by a pack of monsters, and saved me. You can die anytime you
want. No matter how hard it is, those who survive must live to make up for those who died. If you die without
doing what you can, you will surely regret it.

173175.en:
The words of , which were so heavy that I could not have imagined them from such a young age,
pierced my heart deeply. I decided to join the Order of the Knights of the Spur of the Wind. If this life could
save as many people as possible, I would live for that. I apologize. It seems I went on a bit too long. I
think it is time for you to return to the Mayor. Thank you for your help in this matter . I will
thank Mr. Juei later.

173176.en:
. How is Juei? Well, he seems to think that the death of Breyga's wife and child is their
fault. It was no one's fault.

173177.en:
Anyway, you have a message for Breyga,
don't you? Go to him first.

173178.en:
. I'm sorry, but could you please tell Mr. Breyga that I made an offering to the tomb? He is in
front of the meeting room on the lower level, but I am afraid to go and tell him myself. After you tell Mr. Breyga,
please go to the mayor's office. I've left a thank-you note for you.

173179.en:
Do you want to tell Breyga that Juei
asked me to make an offering to his
wife and son's OTOMB?<yesno><close>

173180.en:
The toy sword your mother was making
earlier was an offering for Harumbe-
chan's tombola.<bw_break>

173181.en:
<if_woman><attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Did your sister come to make an
offering? I'm sure Harumbe would be
pleased. Thank you!<else><attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Did your brother come to make an
offering? I'm sure Harumbe would be
pleased. Thank you!<endif>

173182.en:
Death is always possible. No matter how hard it is, those who survive must live to make up for those who have
died. If you die without doing what you can, you will surely regret it.
173182.ja:
ã€Œæ­»ã¬ã“ã¨ãªã‚“ã¦ã€€ã„ã¤ã ã£ã¦ã€€ã§ãã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€ã©ã‚“ãªã«ã€€ã¤ã‚‰ã‹ã‚ã†ã¨ã€€ç”Ÿãæ®‹ã£ãŸè€…ã¯ ã€€æ­»ã‚“ã è€…ã®åˆ†ã¾ã§ã€€ç”Ÿããªã‘ã‚Œã°ãªã‚‰ãªã„ã€‚

173183.en:
The words of were so profound and piercing to my heart that I could not have imagined them at such
a young age. I vowed to use my life to protect the people of this town, and by extension, the future of the Dragon
Tribe. I believe that Endera and Harumbe, who lie in tombs, would want me to do so.

173184.en:
. I see that you have informed Breyga about the offerings. I see that you have finished taking care
of the other tombs. I can tell even without looking. My instincts tell me so! You have done well. I'm sure the
sleepers there will sleep soundly now. Oh, yes. Juei has left a gift for you as a token of his appreciation. You
may accept it as well as my thanks.
173184.ja:

173185.en:
But it seems that Juei and Breyga are still haunted by their loss. I'm not saying there's anything wrong with
that. But I think. I think that those who survive must live happier lives for those who have died.

173186.en:
Oh, I have a good idea! How about we match Juei to Breyga? Hmmm. As mayor, it's my role to make sure that
everyone in this town is happy. Once that's decided, I'll have to make a plan of action. Things are going to
get busy from now on!

173187.en:
I see that you were able to let Breyga know that I made an offering to the two TOMBs. Thank you so much
. I'm sorry I asked you to go through all that trouble. I've left a thank-you note with the mayor.
I didn't have much to offer, but don't hesitate to accept it.
173187.ja:
ã€Œãƒ–ãƒ¬ã‚¨ã‚²ã•ã‚“ã«ã¯ã€€ãµãŸã‚Šã®ãŠå¢“ã« ã€€ãŠä¾›ãˆã‚’ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã‚’ã€€ä¼ãˆã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆãŸã¿ãŸã„ã­ã€‚

173189.en:
Those who survive must live happier lives for those who have died. As part of that, I think it would be a good
idea to make Juei a Breyga. You may say it's none of my business. But it is my role as mayor to see to it that
the people of this town are happy!

173190.en:
Breyga came all the way to thank me just now. I was expecting to be scolded for taking the liberty of
doing so, but I am glad to hear that she was pleased. She is also concerned about our two children, and I knew
Breyga was a very nice person.

173191.en:
Uncle Breyga promised to teach me how
to use a sword.<bw_break>

173192.en:
Alright, I'll do my best for Harumbe! I'll do my best for Harumbe. I'm going to take out all the monsters and take
back the town above!

173193.en:
I don't know why, but Uncle Breyga
patted my head a lot.<bw_break>

173194.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Your hands are big and warm. It
reminded me a little of my father.

173610.en:
<pc>! It seems that Master
Claws is waiting for you at the CHURCH
on the ground.

173917.en:
<pc> was going with Master
Claws to the Nadraga Shrine in each
realm, wasn't he?<bw_break>

175083.en:
Welcome back !It seems that the Vessels of God are being treated at the Knight's Quarters at
the lowest level. Also, Master Claws is waiting for you in the meeting room.

175084.en:
Welcome back. We have heard from Master Claws about your activities at the Nadraga Shrine.
Master Claws would like to speak with , so please go to the meeting room.

175085.en:
That's what and Mr. Claws are for. You were able to save the Vessels of God, weren't you? We
are treating you all at Knight's Quarters next door.

175086.en:
<pc> went up the ladder. But
the door at the end of the ladder was
wedged shut and he could not get out.

175087.en:
Ah ! I am so glad to hear that you are well. I see that Estella is not with you. I am worried about
HER too.

175088.en:
When you were brought in at Kanoke, I felt despair like the end of the world. I am so glad that you are
alive. I heard from Master Claws that you are going after Patriarch Orstov, the man who took the psychic nucleus
of creation. We will protect the Town of Must, so please be careful on your way!

175778.en:
! I'm so glad to hear that you are feeling better! I am so happy for you. The Vessels of God were
all sitting in sorrow for a long time.

179208.en:
I didn't like it because it was dark and cramped, but once you get used to it, life here isn't so bad. But now
that Claws and are gone, I'm going to miss them a little.
179208.ja:

179209.en:
This is . Welcome to the Town of Must, home of the Knights of the Gale. Although Master Claws and
are no longer with us, we are doing our best to fulfill our duties!
179209.ja:

179210.en:
I was surprised to hear that you defeated the resurrected Nadraga! I had not expected you to be so
powerful. I am surprised at you!

179211.en:
Master Claws left Nadragand saying that he had things to do. I was told that also left for
somewhere else. As for the Knights of the Gale, I have been told that I am to take charge of them from now on.
Just because the evil god has been defeated does not mean that peace has come to this land. There are still
many things that must be done. In the meantime, I would like to make it the goal of the Knights to take back the
Town of Must from the hands of the monster.
179211.ja:
ã€Œã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¦ã‚ºæ§˜ã¯ã€€ã”è‡ªåˆ†ã«ã¯ ã€€ã‚„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã€€ãŠã£ã—ã‚ƒã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ ã€€ãƒŠãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‹ã‚‰ã€€æ—…ç«‹ãŸã‚Œã¦ã„ã‹ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

179212.en:
Just because the evil gods have been defeated does not mean that peace has come to this land. There are still
many things that must be done. In the meantime, the goal of the Order is to take back the Town of Must from the
hands of the monster.
179212.ja:
ã€Œé‚ªç¥ãŒå€’ã•ã‚ŒãŸã¨ã¦ã€€ã“ã®åœ°ã« ã€€å¹³ç©ãŒã€€è¨ªã‚ŒãŸã‚ã‘ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ ã€€ã‚„ã‚‰ã­ã°ãªã‚‰ã¬ã“ã¨ã¯ã€€ã¾ã å¤šã„â€¦â€¦ã€‚

179213.en:
I was really surprised when they
brought you in in a coffin. I couldn't
even drink anymore.

179214.en:
You. Don't be too reckless from now
on. You seem to have a lot of people
who grieve your death.

179215.en:
We had no idea that the spiritual core of creation had been stolen from us without our knowledge. After all was
said and done, Master Claws told me. I couldn't help it.

179216.en:
I heard that Master Claws and won't be back here anymore. But the Knights of the Fast
Wind will be fine. Captain Breyga will lead us from now on!

179217.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh. I can't forget that fluff. Prince
Raguas. I hope you'll come visit me
again.

179218.en:
I decided to stay awake so that no intruder would ever come in here again, but I guess that was a bit too
much to ask. It seems that I took a nap and Heldra, who was passing by, gave me a Sobering Slap with all his
might.

179219.en:
I have heard of 's success! I heard that you did everything in your power to defeat the
Evil God and protect the future of the Dragon Tribe!

179220.en:
I just got word from the mayor that the toxins in the karmic wind will eventually become harmless. All we
need now is to get rid of the monster and we can go back to the town above!

179221.en:
I heard that the Knights of the Gale are planning a plan to kill the monsters up there. They don't know
when, but I'd like to get back to my house as soon as possible.

179222.en:
The evil gods have been defeated, but the monsters that infested the town above are not yet gone. But rest
assured. We, the Knights of the Swift Wind, will eventually repel them with all our might!

188578.en:
This is . It's a pleasure to see you again. Since and Mr. Claws left, there seems to be
a hole in my heart. I am so embarrassed. From now on, we, the Knights of the Sprint, must lead this
town to make up for both of you. By the way, . You must have some business with me.

188579.en:
I see that Tobias has gathered the representatives of the five realms for a meeting. I, too, have been thinking
about the need for cooperation between the various realms in the future. Unfortunately, I will not be able to
attend the meeting at this time. I cannot leave here for a while. In fact, the other day I received a
report that a spectral wind had been seen near Cape Squall. It is a wind I have never seen before, a wind with a
strange color, different from the industrial winds that blow here. There are rumors that it may be a harbinger
of bad things to come again in Nadragand, and there is widespread uneasiness among the residents. Our
Knights are investigating, but the winds have drifted so far beyond Cape Squall that we have not even been able
to see them with our own eyes. If we could cross Cape Squall, we might be able to find some clues.

188580.en:
By the way, has crossed Cape Squall before! I am sorry, but could you please go and check it out?
I will be able to attend the meeting once the investigation into the mysterious winds is complete. If you
cross Cape Squall in Heavenly Field and find a spectral wind, please capture it in a photo true. Thank you
very much.

188581.en:
<pc> informed Breyga that a
meeting of the five realms would be
held.

188582.en:
I will not be able to attend the meeting until I have completed my investigation of the spectral winds
sighted in Cape Squall. If I could cross Cape Squall, I might be able to find some clues. I am sorry, but
. Could you please cross Cape Squall at Heavenly Field and check it out? And if you find any
spectral winds, please capture them in a photo true. Thank you very much.

188583.en:
<pc> Did you find the
spectacular wind?

188584.en:
I'm sorry, but I would appreciate your
investigating this matter.

188585.en:
What a surprise! This is a very strange wind! I have never seen anything like this before! What? You
mean to say that this wind has already disappeared? Oh, Divine Beast Amazlantelope says there's nothing
more to worry about. Then I am relieved. However, just to be safe, I'll have the Knights proceed with
their investigation based on this transcript. Thank you very much. You may now attend the
meeting. Please give my regards to the Nadragand Order.

188586.en:
Would you give Ominous Wind Photo to
Breyga?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

188587.en:
<pc> gave Breyga the Ominous
Wind Photo!

188588.en:
Thank you very much. I will let the Knights proceed with their investigation based on that
transcript. Now you can attend the meeting. Please give my best regards to the Nadragand Order.

188639.en:
What is the next evil demon after the
mysterious winds? What on earth is
happening to this Nadragand!

188640.en:
We have received a message from the Nadragand Order and we, the Knights of the Order, are searching for Evil
Will. We will not let him get away with this!

188695.en:
Our investigations have revealed that the demon miasma is the true identity of the spectral winds that have been
appearing in various locations. The winds seem to be gathering at the Nadragram Shrine, where we fear that
something terrible may happen once again. Our Knights are on high alert to keep the town safe!

188696.en:
Since then, neither a spectral wind nor a demon has appeared. The residents seem to be relieved, and we,
the Knights, are also relieved.

195945.en:
I heard about it in the Water Realm at the Five Realms Conference. I didn't realize that besides the demonic
winds, a ferocious monster had also appeared!What on earth is going on in this Nadragand!
